title: Mouse Logitech PRO X Superlight Gaming
description: Less than 63 grams. Advanced LIGHTSPEED wireless technology with low latency. Sub-micron accuracy with HERO 25K sensor. Eliminate all obstacles with our lightest and fastest PRO wireless mouse.

title: HyperX Alloy Elite 2
description: For gamers, streamers and multitaskers who need more control at their fingertips, HyperX Alloy Elite 2 is the keyboard for you. With dedicated media keys and a large volume wheel, this full-featured gaming keyboard is ready for everything from editing videos to watching movies.

title: Mousepad HyperX Fury S XL Speed

The pad is made of a high-density fabric that provides a soft-touch surface yet has a fine texture ideal for optical mouse use. Dimensions: 900mm x 420mm
